itemInfo.title: French fries
itemInfo.description: It’s not the potato that’s the problem—it’s the salt. High-sodium diets cause bloating that, while not technically a medical problem, can put you in a lousy mood. To help combat a salty diet, drink lots of water.

itemInfo.title: Hot and Sour Soup
itemInfo.description: A soup with a spicy and sour broth. It is made spicy by using red peppers or white pepper and sour with vinegar.
